long_description: Lighting your way for 6 hrs. of run time during commutes or rides in the dark, the NiteRider MiNewt Mini.350 makes certain you'll have a light on your path until you reach your destination. 3 continuous light levels include high, medium, low as well as a flashing mode for safety; run times range from 2 hrs. on high to 6 hrs. on low to 4.5 hrs. on flash. Light output for each level includes 350 lumens on high, 200 lumens on medium, 120 lumens on low. Custom reflector provides an ideal beam pattern for night cycling. Battery can be charged from the USB port of your computer, making charging at the office a snap; 4.5 hrs. maximum charge time. Battery can mount on the stem; system is very small so there are many options for mounting. Low battery indicator lets you know when it's time to recharge. Incorporated quick-release handlebar mount on the NiteRider MiNewt Mini.350 bike light fits handlebar diameters up to 31.8mm; light can be easily disconnected from mount. Includes bike light, battery, charger, USB charging cable and handelbar mount.
